lead_paragraph: Why We Plan Ethelbert Smith said he certainly did believe in the planned life -- national planning, international planning, economic planning, political planning. He was convinced that without a plan of some kind the future of mankind was dark indeed.
abstract: ed on Stalin's 5-yr plans as preparation for clash with Hitler
